title: League client looks like an old version?
body: I was having problems getting into the client after a small update today.  I restarted comp and got right in but now the client looks old and outdated and also I cannot click on my chat. friends, or any notification.  DId they update the way the client looks??  I have only been playing for a few months but what i'm seeing looks much worse than what I had before this update.  ALso im using legacy client.

replies.body:
It sounds like there may have been an issue with the patching process. I recommend grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and running the *Force Repatch* function by checking the box and hitting **START**. Afterward, launch League to finish the patching process.

Let me know if this worked for you!
The legacy client is the old client... you were probably on the new one before.
Nope I wasn't on the new one, comp couldnt handle it.
